alert.note: Alert for Banner; Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 5:06AM CST until January 03 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Sioux, Scotts Bluff, Banner, Dawes, and Box Butte counties in the Nebraska Panhandle. This includes but is not limited to Harrison, Chadron, Alliance, Scottsbluff, and Harrisburg. The highest amounts are expected along the Pine Ridge in northern Sioux and Dawes counties. * WHEN...5 PM MST today until 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
